---
filters:
  - gradio

gradio:
  requirements:
    - plotly==5.24.0
---

```{python}
import gradio as gr
import plotly.express as px

datasets = {
    "iris": px.data.iris(),
    "gapminder": px.data.gapminder(), 
    "tips": px.data.tips()
}
default_dataset = list(datasets.keys())[0]


def plot_figure(dataset):
    if not dataset:
        return None
    df = datasets[dataset]
    return px.scatter(
        df,
        x=df.columns[0],
        y=df.columns[1], 
        color=df.columns[-1],
        title=f"{dataset.title()} Dataset"
    )


gr.Interface(
    fn=plot_figure,
    inputs=gr.Dropdown(
        choices=list(datasets.keys()),
        value=default_dataset,
    ),
    outputs="plot",
    flagging_mode="never"
).launch()
```
